section.name: Depot Application Management
section.p: The Depot product is an application management system that we will be using in the OSM tutorials. Depot comes preconfigured with the Transit resource managment system and a set of services that will handle the automatic installation of the Magic build system (used extensivly throught the tutorials), and the Metro component management platform. The core set of products we will be dealing with include the following DPML solution.

tr.td: Depot is a utility used in the management of applications. It provides support for product installation, Transit preference management, application deployment and server activation.

Transit is a small resource managmenet system based on the JVM URL Handler architecture. It provides support for the retrieval and caching of resources and service supporting plugin deployment. Transit is included as a part of the Depot distribution.

Magic is an antlib that provides support for transitive dependencies across projects. Magic is used daily in the management of 100s of interdependent projects within DPML and is a foundation tool in dealing with highly complexity applications and the automation of component meta data generation. Installation of Magic can be executed via Depot as required.

Metro is a state-of-the-art component management platform that delivers complete support for Inversion of Control, componet assembly, dynamic component management, and complete plug-and-play semantics. Installation of Magic can be executed via Depot as required.

subsection.name: Java JDK @JAVA-PRODUCT-VERSION@
subsection.p: Products and tutorials included under this site require the installation of Java @JAVA-PRODUCT-VERSION@ or later. General speaking this means you need to install the Java @JAVA-PRODUCT-VERSION@ SDK for development purposes. If your needs are limited to runtime solutions you may want to install just the Java @JAVA-PRODUCT-VERSION@ JRE (also included within the JDK).

subsection.name: Ant @ANT-PRODUCT-VERSION@
subsection.p: Magic is an Ant extension library (antlib). To fucntion correctly you need to install the Ant @ANT-PRODUCT-VERSION@ binary distribution.
